attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time for a major overhaul where we:

*Remove CCTV camera's which have failed to reduce crime.

*Make the obligatory signs which alert people to the presence of CCTV a MINIMUM of 20cm x 40cm in size, in highly visible, high-contrast lettering, placed where it is easy to see and difficult to vandalise, and levy heavy fines on those who ignore these requirements.

*Place signs near CCTV cameras informing of any face-detection technology which is being used.

*Place signs near CCTV cameras informing of any microphone and/or speaker technology in use.
